beer.beer_name: To Central With Love Pinot Noir Wild Ale
beer.beer_description:
To Central, With Love – Barrel Aged Pinot Noir Wild Ale 7.2% 
We’ve teamed up with Carrick Winery to create a true love letter to all things Central Otago. Queenstown grown malt, Garston hops, second use organic pinot noir grapes and wild yeast cultivated from local thyme flowers.
This beer was aged in oak for 13 months and then re-fermented on the grape pomace to create a unique piquette style beer with huge notes of black currant, red fruits and subtle oak.
A refreshing beverage for both beer and wine lovers alike. 
Original artwork by Leon Ofsky and Elana Marie Szczepanski, remixed by Canyon.
Contains gluten  • Vegan

items.badge_description: Guess what? We’re officially 14! From October 22nd to October 27th, we’re celebrating Untappd’s 14th anniversary (woo woo)! Thanks to every one of you for making this beautifully diverse community what it is today! Let’s raise our glasses, check in a brew, earn this badge, and cheers to the next 14 years of memories with you! For extra credit, be sure to check out the latest Hop Culture piece on the beers with most 5-star check-ins on Untappd so far in 2024.

Canning is all the rage and it's not hard to see why - travels well, more environmentally friendly, and no need to carry your bottle opener. That's 85 checkins with the serving style of Can. Try 5 more for Level 18! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

items.badge_description: Guess what? We’re officially 14! From October 22nd to October 27th, we’re celebrating Untappd’s 14th anniversary (woo woo)! Thanks to every one of you for making this beautifully diverse community what it is today! Let’s raise our glasses, check in a brew, earn this badge, and cheers to the next 14 years of memories with you! For extra credit, be sure to check out the latest Hop Culture piece on the beers with most 5-star check-ins on Untappd so far in 2024.

Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!
One cannot live on dank hops alone. Tone down the bitterness and enjoy some smooth flavor. That's 100 different beers with an IBU of 20 or below. Try 5 more for Level 21!

Canning is all the rage and it's not hard to see why - travels well, more environmentally friendly, and no need to carry your bottle opener. That's 455 checkins with the serving style of Can. Try 5 more for Level 92! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

Round and round the wheel goes! Which style you’ll be drinking, nobody knows! Your desire to explore different styles is inspiring. Keep it up! That's a check-in to at least 140 different styles. Try 5 more for Level 29!

items.checkin_comment: Met some nice folks from Mikkeller Running Club of Orange County

items.badge_description: Happy Barrel-Aged Beer Day 2024! The beer you just drank is one of many styles that just might be barrel-aged! Each year, on the first Friday of October, we honor the time, patience, and devotion that define this cherished tradition. Beer can lie in barrels for months or even years, biding its time until the perfect moment arrives for its flavors to be enjoyed—and that kind of dedication is nothing to bark at.
It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That’s 65 check-ins with a photo.

items.badge_description:
When life gives you lemons, you make a sour beer!

Today marks the celebration of Sour Beer Day 2024, honoring all those tart treats many of us appreciate and love.

We're looking for Brett, have you seen him? Looks like you have! American Wild Ale and Brett Beer are very popular now-a-days, so Brett can't hide any longer! That's 5 different beers with the style of Brett Beer, American Wild Ale, IPA - Brett or Wild Ale - Other. Try 5 more for Level 2!
